cui_name: Recurrent Lung Carcinoma Cell Type Unspecified
reasoning: Lung cancer recurrence incidence estimated at ~5.2 per 100k based on GLOBOCAN 2005 primary lung cancer incidence (~16 per 100k) with estimated 30-35% annual recurrence rate among survivors. 'Cell type unspecified' introduces diagnostic uncertainty and reduces confidence.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC); recurrence estimates derived from epidemiological literature
